page.title: 03FIRE STATION, FAZAKERLEY
page.content: The full name of this Fire Station is {Merseyside Fire Brigade,}Longmoor Lane North 2. 32 men work at this station and they are divided into{watches.} Each watch consists of eight men. The watches are known as{Red, Blue, Green {and White}watch. The men work shifts. The night shift lasts for 15 hours while the day one lasts for 9 hours. The station is in the hands of the{Station Officer}and he sets up the duty rotas for the men. Each man's name is written up on the rota and the position his name appears in tells him what his job will be that day. The first and third on the list wear the{breathing apparatus}that day, the second is the{driver}while the fourth man is the{water man.}
